mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", u1.id AS "saler.id", u1.name AS "saler.name", a.business_person_id AS "businessPerson.id", u2.name AS "businessPerson.name", a.artisan_id AS "artisan.id", u3.name AS "artisan.name", a.remark AS "remark", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"

RIGHT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.saler_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u1.id INNER JOIN sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id and r.enname = 'saler' LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.business_person_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.artisan_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_people_setting a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.saler_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_people_setting( id, saler_id, business_person_id, artisan_id, remark, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{saler.id}, #{businessPerson.id}, #{artisan.id}, #{remark}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_people_setting SET saler_id = #{saler.id}, business_person_id = #{businessPerson.id}, artisan_id = #{artisan.id}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
